metadata.name: Lost Cause
metadata.description:
Hi if you don’t know me, my name’s Daniel Hopin. I produce electro/alt/funk stuff under the name Vivid Fever Dreams.  

This is my genesis NFT. A song about self-worth, failure and resilience. Really happy with how it came together and I hope you enjoy listening! 

Owning this token will grant you access to presale on future releases and a telegram chat (once I get all the kinks worked out...). Also if you want the stems to remix just send me a DM on Twitter (@beatsbyDJay) and I’ll send you over the files. 

If you like the sounds I’m making and want to support the creation of future sounds, I’d love to have you as a collector! 

Appreciate all of you for peepin  

<3 - Vivid Fever Dreams
